entry.title: Saturday night: Showers. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
